com.mappedin.sdk.internal.nineoldandroids.animation

Interface TimeAnimator.TimeListener

  • Enclosing class:
    TimeAnimator

    public static interface TimeAnimator.TimeListener
    Implementors of this interface can set themselves as update listeners to a TimeAnimator instance to receive callbacks on every animation frame to receive the total time since the animator started and the delta time since the last frame. The first time the listener is called, totalTime and deltaTime should both be zero.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onTimeUpdate(TimeAnimator animation, long totalTime, long deltaTime)
      Notifies listeners of the occurrence of another frame of the animation, along with information about the elapsed time.

    • Method Detail
